document_data.name: ''Spear of Accuracy''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spears of accuracy''''' were enchanted [[spear]]s that were found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Powers: The magic of these spears made it easier for the wielder to strike and harm their opponent. These effects were multiplied even more if a ''spear of accuracy'' was thrown versus being wielded as a melee weapon.
